articles.title: Solar storm warning: NASA predicts direct Earth hit from 'fast' impact– Where will it hit? - Express
articles.description: A SOLAR storm is expected by astronomers to hit the planet this weekend, with scientists predicting possible areas where people may be able to see its effects.

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Solar Orbiter swings by the sun to unravel its mysteries - CNN International
articles.description: The Solar Orbiter mission will make its closest flyby of the sun Saturday since launching in February 2020. The spacecraft will come within 31 million miles of our star, taking images and collecting data.
